::Zardus::

Rummaging through crates, Zardus recieves Dark Angel's transmission, 
finally finding the bot he had been loking for.

He stands up, activating his comm.

"I'll be out to speak shortly," he says, slinging the bot he had 
gotten over his shoulder and walking off toward the exit. THe bot 
over his shoulder was covered in a black sheet, the face and the body 
not visble through the cover.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Jason Lind" <icedemon101@h...> wrote:
> [Megan would you please hurry up with putting the engines on the 
Ark because 
> I want to get rid of Brooders group.]
> 
> Dark Angel
> 
> 
> 
> a vortex opens out stands a bot who looks almost like Arcangel but 
he is

the rest 
> who turned there back on the vok. he is not to far from the 
alliance base so 
> he flys towards it and opens a com to Zardus.
> 
> 
> 
> Dark Angel:
> 
> 
> "Zardus I have been sent here to help you but first I need to talk 
to you."
> 
> 
> he keeps flying towards the alliance base.
